text.exordium.enableSignBuffering.toolti:
Enable/Disable Sign Text Buffering
* Not Compatible with Enhanced Block Entities (Enhanced Signs); Use ImmediatelyFast Buffering instead.

Enable/Disable Nametags Buffering on the Screen
* Very buggy
